LanguageData.PsychicHarmonization.stages.0.label: psychic harmony: {HARMONIZER_labelShort}
LanguageData.PsychicHarmonization.stages.0.descriptio: The psychic harmonizer implant makes me feel some of the emotions of the person using it as long as we're close together.
LanguageData.GainedTitle.stages.0.label: Received {TITLE} title
LanguageData.GainedTitle.stages.0.description: I have been given the title of {TITLE}. I love the recognition!
LanguageData.LostTitle.stages.0.label: Lost {TITLE} title
LanguageData.TitleApparelRequirementNotMet.stages.0.d: {TITLE_indefinite} like myself should be covered in apparel appropriate to my stature:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.TitleApparelMinQualityNotMet.stages.0.de: {TITLE_indefinite} like myself should only wear apparel of {QUALITY} quality or better.
LanguageData.TitleThroneroomRequirementsNotMet.stages: I am {TITLE_indefinite} and I should have these items in my throneroom:\n\n{0}
{TITLE_indefinite} like myself deserves a bedroom that meets these requirements:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.TitleNoThroneRoom.stages.0.label: no throne room
LanguageData.TitleNoThroneRoom.stages.0.description: What is a royal with no throneroom?
LanguageData.TitleNoPersonalBedroom.stages.0.label: no personal bedroom
LanguageData.OtherTravelerDied.stages.0.label: traveler died
LanguageData.AteFoodInappropriateForTitle.stages.0.de: That meal was below my station. My title's formal requirements should always be respected.
LanguageData.OtherTravelerArrested.stages.0.label: traveler arrested
LanguageData.OtherTravelerArrested.stages.0.descripti: One of our companions was taken prisoner!
LanguageData.OtherTravelerSurgicallyViolated.stages.0: One of our companions was surgically violated. Nothing could justify that.
LanguageData.TerribleBestowingCeremony.stages.0.label: terrible bestowing ceremony
LanguageData.TerribleBestowingCeremony.stages.0.descr: The bestowing ceremony somehow felt petty and self-indulgent at the same time.
LanguageData.UnimpressiveBestowingCeremony.stages.0.d: The bestowing ceremony felt mechanical and lifeless.
LanguageData.HonorableBestowingCeremony.stages.0.desc: The bestowing ceremony brought a sense of dignity and honor to the participants.
LanguageData.GrandioseBestowingCeremony.stages.0.desc: The bestowing ceremony was like a taste of true grandeur, and a moment of participation in something greater.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.0.label: awful throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.0.description: I had to reign in an awful throneroom. It's like a deliberate insult from my inferiors.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.1.label: dull throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.1.description: I had to reign in a dull throneroom. It clearly diminished my stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.2.label: mediocre throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.2.description: I had to reign in a mediocre throneroom. It didn't express my stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.6.label: very impressive throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.6.description: I reigned in a very impressive throneroom. It expressed noticeable stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.7.description: I reigned in an extremely impressive throneroom. It effectively demonstrated my stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.8.description: I reigned in an unbelievably impressive throneroom. The commoners will be amazed at my highness.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive throneroom
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.9.description: I reigned in a heavenly throneroom. It matched my grace and nobility.
LanguageData.DecreeMet.stages.0.label: decree satisfied
LanguageData.DecreeMet.stages.0.description: My noble authority has been respected as it should be.
LanguageData.DecreeFailed.stages.0.label: decree failed
LanguageData.DecreeFailed.stages.0.description: My noble authority has not been respected as it should be.
LanguageData.Disinherited.stages.0.label: disinherited
LanguageData.Disinherited.stages.0.description: I was disinherited of my title. Do I need to get medieval on these people?
LanguageData.NeuroquakeEcho.stages.0.label: neuroquake echo
LanguageData.NeuroquakeEcho.stages.0.description: Distant, unfamilliar echoes of terror and grief. It makes me feel nervous and shaky.
LanguageData.ListeningToHarp.stages.0.label: listening to harp
LanguageData.ListeningToHarpsichord.stages.0.label: listening to harpsichord
LanguageData.ListeningToHarpsichord.stages.0.descript: The complexity of the harpsichord fulfills my mind.
LanguageData.ListeningToPiano.stages.0.label: listening to piano
LanguageData.ListeningToPiano.stages.0.description: The piano's range makes me feel melancholy, excited, and whimsical at the same time. What a sound.
LanguageData.DecreeUnmet.stages.0.label: decree ignored
LanguageData.DecreeUnmet.stages.0.description: My decree has been ignored for far too long {0}.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyOverloaded.stages.0.label: minor psychic breakdown
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyOverloaded.stages.0.descri: There's an electrical pain behind my eyes. It's hard to focus; hard to think.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyOverloaded.stages.1.label: major psychic breakdown
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyOverloaded.stages.1.descri: My mind has been stir-fried. Dizzy, fuzzy, can't think, always aching.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyOverloaded.stages.2.label: total psychic breakdown
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyOverloaded.stages.2.descri: I'm spinning, it hurts, I'm dizzy, think, can't think, can't think...
LanguageData.AnimaScream.stages.0.label: anima scream
LanguageData.AnimaScream.stages.0.description: Such a pain in my head when the tree died. And it keeps echoing...
LanguageData.Joyfuzz.stages.0.label: joyfuzz
LanguageData.Joyfuzz.stages.0.description: No matter what happens, I feel like I'm okay with it for some reason.
LanguageData.PsychicLove.stages.0.label: psychic love
LanguageData.BondedThoughtKind.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s kind thoughts
LanguageData.BondedThoughtKind.stages.0.description: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is whispering kind thoughts to me.
LanguageData.BondedThoughtCalm.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s calm thoughts
LanguageData.BondedThoughtCalm.stages.0.description: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is whispering calming thoughts to me.
LanguageData.BondedThoughtMuttering.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s muttering
LanguageData.BondedThoughtMuttering.stages.0.descript: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is muttering in my head. It's hard to ignore sometimes.
LanguageData.BondedThoughtWailing.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s wailing
LanguageData.BondedThoughtWailing.stages.0.descriptio: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is wailing madly in my head. I wish I could ignore it.
LanguageData.OnKill_GoodThought.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s kill happiness
LanguageData.OnKill_GoodThought.stages.0.description: {WEAPON} was overjoyed with its kill, and I feel some of that too.
LanguageData.OnKill_BadThought.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s kill sorrow
LanguageData.OnKill_BadThought.stages.0.description: {WEAPON}'s sorrow over its kill is affecting my mind as well.
LanguageData.KillThirst.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s kill thirst
LanguageData.KillThirst.stages.0.description: My bonded weapon {WEAPON} is angry it has gone so long without killing. I can feel its rage.
LanguageData.JealousRage.stages.0.label: {WEAPON}'s jealousy
LanguageData.JealousRage.stages.0.description: My bonded weapon {WEAPON} is jealous I am using another weapon. I can feel the rage it is screaming into my head.
